00012 MavenVariables dissectArguments(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00013         // chomp () off
00014         line = trim(line.substr(1, line.length() - 2));
00015         MavenVariables vars;
00016         if(line == "") return vars;
00017         
00018         // process
00019         StringList args = splitCommas(line);
00020         for(int i = 0; i < args.length(); ++i)
00021                 vars.push(dissectVariable(c, args[i]));
00022         
00023         return vars;
00024 }
